ModMetaData.name: Colorful Coats - Vanilla Animals Expanded!
ModMetaData.author: purpleyam
ModMetaData.description: More colors for the pets and wildlife from Vanilla Animals Expanded! This mod will work with VAE core, or the older modular versions if you are for some reason still using those. Will also add some color variations to the animals from Vanilla Animals Expanded - Endangered if you are using that mod!
